ðŸ“– Summary: The iOS Simulator MCP Server enables interaction with iOS simulators through a Model Context Protocol. It provides functionalities to retrieve simulator information, control UI interactions (tapping, swiping, text input), inspect UI elements, take screenshots, and integrate with AI agents for visual feedback, primarily used for automated QA testing and validation.
